Class FixedWidthGrid

All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.gwt.user.client.EventListener, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasWidgets, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.SourcesTableEvents, HasAutoFitColumn, HasFixedColumnWidth, HasTableCells, SourceTableSelectionEvents
Direct Known Subclasses:
SortableFixedWidthGrid
public class FixedWidthGrid
extends SelectionGrid
implements HasFixedColumnWidth, HasAutoFitColumn

A variation of the Grid that resizes columns using a fixed table width.
